articles.title: Bruce Willis, 68, flashes a smile riding on Splash Mountain at Disneyland...amid dementia battle - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bruce Willis, 68, was seen sharing a big smile and a laugh as he rode Splash Mountain with his family during a trip to Disneyland after being diagnosed with frontotemporal dementia earlier this year.
articles.content: Bruce Willis flashed a cheerful smile, much to the delight of fans, as he enjoyed a ride on Splash Mountain during a trip to Disneyland in a new Instagram video shared by wife, Emma Heming, on Thursd… [+8513 chars]
